52f34c956f4c.actionBody:
user.vscode("workbench.action.terminal.focus")
build_path = user.relative_dir_to_talon_home("colton_talon^update")
clip.set_text("cd '{build_path}'; chmod +x update.sh; ./update.sh; cd ..")
key(ctrl-shift-v)
key(enter)

280c3fe413f2.actionBody:
insert('import unittest')
key(enter)
repeat(1)
insert('class (unittest.TestCase):')
key(enter:2)
edit.delete()
insert("if __name__ == '__main__':")
key(enter)
insert('unittest.main()')
edit.up()
repeat(2)
edit.line_start()
edit.right()
repeat(5)
